jdbcService.sql: update component_template set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), name = case when :name is null then name else :name end, display_name = case when :displayName is null then display_name else :displayName end, description = case when :description is null then description else :description end, component_id = case when :componentId is null then component_id else :componentId end where id = :id
